{
  "name": "Pension Report",
  "templateId": "pension_deduction",
  "code": "PENSIONADMIN",
  "title": "Pension Report",
  "description": "A report showing the Bulk payouts to each tax office, tax payments by individual staff and details of tax deducted for employees.",
  "engineType": "JASPER",
  "module" : "PAYROLL",
  "displayOrder": 7,
  "userrole": "ADMIN",
  "preparationQueries": [],
  "preGenScripts": [
    {
      "queryId": "QUERY",
      "gvScript": "import java.util.UUID; \r\nimport com.systemspecs.remita.report.vo.*; \r\ndef resultMap=new HashMap();\r\ndef templateId=  ctx[\"templateId\"];\r\ndef reportObject = ctx[\"report\"];\r\ndef filtername;\r\ndef reporttypeFiltervalue;\r\ndef sort1Filtervalue;\r\ndef query = \"SELECT a.PAYPERIOD,STAFFNUMBER,a.SURNAME,a.OTHERNAMES,GROSSPAY,EMPLOYEEPENSION,EMPLOYERPENSION,VOLPENSION,TOTALPENSION,PENSION_ID,PFA_ID,PFA_NAME, companyname, ' ' periodFrom,' ' periodTo FROM payroll_pension_vw a where a.company_id = '{{companyId}}'\";\r\ndef filterArray = reportObject.reportFilter;\r\nprintln \":::::::::::::::::::: $filterArray\";\r\n\r\nif(filterArray != null){\r\n    reporttypeFiltervalue = filterArray.stream()  \r\n                 .filter { s -> s.name.equals(\"reporttype\") }.map{ a -> a.value}\r\n                 .findFirst()\r\n                 .orElse(\"null\");\r\n    sort1Filtervalue = filterArray.stream()  \r\n                 .filter { s -> s.name.equals(\"sort1\") }.map{ a -> a.value}\r\n                 .findFirst()\r\n                 .orElse(\"null\"); // detailed\r\n\r\n    if(reporttypeFiltervalue!=null){\r\n        \r\n        if(reporttypeFiltervalue.equals(\"pensionpayments\") && sort1Filtervalue.equals(\"summary\") ){// summary\r\n            templateId=\"pension_deduction_summary\";\r\n        }else if(reporttypeFiltervalue.equals(\"nsitf_payments\") ){// summary and detailed\r\n            templateId=\"nsitf_deduction\";\r\n            query = \"SELECT ' ' periodFrom,' ' periodTo, a.*  from nsitfcontribution_view a where a.company_id = '{{companyId}}'\";\r\n           \r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n}\r\nresultMap[\"templateId\"]= templateId;\r\nresultMap[\"sql\"]= query;\r\nresultMap[\"ctxJoe\"]= ctx;\r\nprintln \"Processed groovy..............\";\r\nreturn resultMap;"
      
    },
    {
      "queryId": "QUERY2",
      "gvScript": "select 1 from dual"
    }
  ],

    {
      "queryAlias": "a",
      "startFilterWithAnd": "true",

}\r\n        //rowpaymentfile\r\n        if(viewtypeFiltervalue.equals(\"detailed\") ){\r\n            templateId=\"paymentitem\";\r\n        }else if(viewtypeFiltervalue.equals(\"summary\") ){\r\n ctx[\"report\"];\r\ndef filtername;\r\ndef reporttypeFiltervalue;\r\ndef viewtypeFiltervalue;\r\ndef report_title;\r\ndef groupByHeader;\r\ndef query;\r\ndef filterArray = reportObject.reportFilter;\r\nprintln \":::::::::::::::::::: $filterArray\";\r\nprintln \":::::::::::::::::::: $ctx\";\r\n\r\nif(filterArray != null){\r\n    reporttypeFiltervalue = filterArray.stream()  \r\n                 .filter { s -> s.name.equals(\"reporttype\") }.map{ a -> a.value}\r\n                 .findFirst()\r\n                 .orElse(\"null\");\r\n    viewtypeFiltervalue = filterArray.stream()  \r\n                 .filter { s -> s.name.equals(\"viewtype\") }.map{ a -> a.value}\r\n                 .findFirst()\r\n                 .orElse(\"null\");\r\n\r\n    if(reporttypeFiltervalue!=null){\r\n        if(filterArray.get(\"group1\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"paygroupname\")){\r\n            groupByHeader = \"Pay Group\";\r\n        }else if(filterArray.get(\"group1\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"benef\")){\r\n            groupByHeader = \"Beneficiary\";\r\n        }else if(filterArray.get(\"group1\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"staffnumber\")){\r\n            groupByHeader = \"Staff\";\r\n        }else if(filterArray.get(\"group1\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"prefered_name\")){\r\n            groupByHeader = \"Pay Item\";\r\n        }else if(filterArray.get(\"group1\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"payperiod\")){\r\n            groupByHeader = \"Pay Period\";\r\n        }\r\n        query = String.format(\"select r.type, r.prefered_name, r.amount, r.payperiod, r.batchnumber, r.default_label_id, r.paygroupcode, r.paygroupname, r.company_id, '%s' report_title, '%s' groupByHeader, r.analy1, r.analy2, r.analy3, r.analy4, r.analy5, r.analy1_code, r.analy2_code, r.analy3_code, r.analy4_code, r.analy5_code, a.name as compname, r.id as staff_id, s.surname, s.othernames, s.staffnumber \", report_title, groupByHeader);\r\n        query = String.format(\"%s from rowpaymentfile r join staffrecord s on s.id = r.id join accountholder a on a.id = r.company_id where r.company_id = '{{companyId}}' and Staffrecord_id='{{staffRecordId}}'\", query);\r\n\t                    \r\n\t                    \r\n\t                    \r\n        if(reporttypeFiltervalue.equals(\"allowance\")){\r\n            query = String.format(\"%s and r.type in ('A') and r.default_label_id not in ('Gross', 'Net')\", query);\r\n           if(filterArray.get(\"allowance\")!=null && !filterArray.get(\"allowance\").equals(\"\") ){\r\n               query = String.format(\"%s and r.payrolllabelsetup_id = '%s'\", query, filterArray.get(\"allowance\"));\r\n           }\r\n        }else if(reporttypeFiltervalue.equals(\"deduction\") ){\r\n            query = String.format(\"%s and type in ('D')\", query);\r\n           if(filterArray.get(\"deductions\")!=null && !filterArray.get(\"deductions\").equals(\"\") ){\r\n               query = String.format(\"%s and r.payrolllabelsetup_id = '%s'\", query, filterArray.get(\"deductions\"));\r\n           }\r\n        }\r\n        //rowpaymentfile\r\n        if(viewtypeFiltervalue.equals(\"detailed\") ){\r\n            templateId=\"paymentitem\";\r\n        }else if(viewtypeFiltervalue.equals(\"summary\") ){\r\n            templateId=\"leave_report_summary\";\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n}\r\nresultMap[\"templateId\"]= templateId;\r\nresultMap[\"sql\"]= query;\r\nprintln \"Processed groovy..............\";\r\nreturn resultMap;"

{

    	"queryId": "QUERY",
    	"gvScript":"import java.util.UUID; \r\nimport com.systemspecs.remita.report.vo.*; \r\ndef resultMap=new HashMap();\r\ndef templateId=  ctx[\"templateId\"];\r\ndef reportObject = ctx[\"report\"];\r\ndef daytypeFiltervalue;\r\ndef query = \"select STAFFNAME ||'('||STAFFRECORD_ID||')' GROUPBY, a.company_id,a.period,a.STAFFRECORD_ID,a.staffname,timesheetdate, case when full_day = 0  then 'Normal' end full_day, a.RESUMPTIONTIME,a.CLOSINGTIME,a.MINS_SPENT, a.company_mins,case when a.company_mins - mins_spent < 0 then 0 else a.company_mins - mins_spent end mins_absent,a.BREAKFROM,a.breakto,a.MINS_BREAK,mins_worked,actual_ovtm,ovtm paid_ovtm from timesheet_vw a where a.company_id = '{{companyId}}'\";\r\ndef filterArray = reportObject.reportFilter;\r\nprintln \":::::::::::::::::::: $filterArray\";\r\n\r\nif(filterArray != null){\r\n          daytypeFiltervalue = filterArray.stream()  \r\n                 .filter { s -> s.name.equals(\"daytype\") }.map{ a -> a.value}\r\n                 .findFirst()\r\n                 .orElse(\"null\");\r\n\r\n    if(daytypeFiltervalue!=null){\r\n        \r\n        if(daytypeFiltervalue.equals(\"PH\") ){\r\n            query= String.format(\"%s and a.HOLIDAY_FLAG='1'\", query);\r\n        }else if(daytypeFiltervalue.equals(\"ND\") ){\r\n            query= String.format(\"%s and a.FULL_DAY='1'\", query);\r\n        }else if(daytypeFiltervalue.equals(\"WE\") ){\r\n            query= String.format(\"%s and a.WEEKEND_FLAG='1'\", query);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n}\r\nresultMap[\"templateId\"]= templateId;\r\nresultMap[\"sql\"]= query;\r\nprintln \"Processed groovy..............\";\r\nreturn resultMap;"

{
  "templateId": "timesheet_report",
  "code": "TIMESHEET",
  "title": "Admin Timesheet Report",
  "description": "Displays Staff timesheet",
  "engineType": "JASPER",
  "name": "Admin Timesheet Report",
  "module": "PAYROLL",
  "displayOrder":"4",
  "userrole": "ESS",
  "preparationQueries": [],
  "preGenScripts": [
	{
    	"queryId": "QUERY",
    	"gvScript":"import java.util.UUID; \r\nimport com.systemspecs.remita.report.vo.*; \r\ndef resultMap=new HashMap();\r\ndef templateId=  ctx[\"templateId\"];\r\ndef reportObject = ctx[\"report\"];\r\ndef daytypeFiltervalue;\r\ndef query = \"select STAFFNAME ||'('||STAFFRECORD_ID||')' GROUPBY, a.company_id,a.period,a.STAFFRECORD_ID,a.staffname,timesheetdate, case when full_day = 0  then 'Normal' end full_day, a.RESUMPTIONTIME,a.CLOSINGTIME,a.MINS_SPENT, a.company_mins,case when a.company_mins - mins_spent < 0 then 0 else a.company_mins - mins_spent end mins_absent,a.BREAKFROM,a.breakto,a.MINS_BREAK,mins_worked,actual_ovtm,ovtm paid_ovtm from timesheet_vw a where a.company_id = '{{companyId}}' and Staffrecord_id='{{staffRecordId}}'\";\r\ndef filterArray = reportObject.reportFilter;\r\nprintln \":::::::::::::::::::: $filterArray\";\r\n\r\nif(filterArray != null){\r\n          daytypeFiltervalue = filterArray.stream()  \r\n                 .filter { s -> s.name.equals(\"daytype\") }.map{ a -> a.value}\r\n                 .findFirst()\r\n                 .orElse(\"null\");\r\n\r\n    if(daytypeFiltervalue!=null){\r\n        \r\n        if(daytypeFiltervalue.equals(\"PH\") ){\r\n            query= String.format(\"%s and a.HOLIDAY_FLAG='1'\", query);\r\n        }else if(daytypeFiltervalue.equals(\"ND\") ){\r\n            query= String.format(\"%s and a.FULL_DAY='1'\", query);\r\n        }else if(daytypeFiltervalue.equals(\"WE\") ){\r\n            query= String.format(\"%s and a.WEEKEND_FLAG='1'\", query);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n}\r\nresultMap[\"templateId\"]= templateId;\r\nresultMap[\"sql\"]= query;\r\nprintln \"Processed groovy..............\";\r\nreturn resultMap;"
		
	}
  ],
  "generationQueries": [
    {
      "queryAlias":"a",
      "startFilterWithAnd":"true",	
      "queryId": "QUERY",
      "query": "select STAFFNAME ||'('||STAFFRECORD_ID||')' GROUPBY, a.company_id,a.period,a.STAFFRECORD_ID,a.staffname,timesheetdate, case when full_day = 0  then 'Normal' end full_day, a.RESUMPTIONTIME,a.CLOSINGTIME,a.MINS_SPENT, a.company_mins,case when a.company_mins - mins_spent < 0 then 0 else a.company_mins - mins_spent end mins_absent,a.BREAKFROM,a.breakto,a.MINS_BREAK,mins_worked,actual_ovtm,ovtm paid_ovtm from timesheet_vw a where a.company_id = '{{companyId}}' and Staffrecord_id='{{staffRecordId}}' ",
